author: Adam Booker
title: ðŸš¨ MbappÃ© scores three, PSG score nine in thumping of Revel
text:
PSG cruised away to sixth-tier side
[Revel](/en/team/revel-52710), advancing to the next round of the [Coupe de France](/en/competition/coupe-de-france-33/fixtures).
Scorers: MbappÃ© 16â€² 45â€², 48â€², Nâ€™Guessan (OG) 38â€², Asensio 43â€², Ramos (P) 71â€², Kolo Muani 76â€² 90â€², Ndour 88â€²
Minnows
[Revel](/en/team/revel-52710) held on in the opening 15 minutes as [PSG](/en/team/psg-263) probed for the opener, but the solid rearguard wouldnâ€™t remain that way for long as Kylian MbappÃ© broke the deadlock for the visitors.
PSG doubled their lead before the break thanks to a Maxence Nâ€™Guessan own-goal after a pinpoint Nordi Mukiele cross.
The tie was all but killed off in the dying minutes of the half with goals from Marco Asensio and Kylian MbappÃ© seeing the visitors go four ahead of their hosts.
MbappÃ© started the second-half how he ended the first, tapping home from close range to complete his hat-trick.
Meanwhile,
[PSG](/en/team/psg-263) registered their sixth of the night from the penalty spot in the final 20 minutes, as GonÃ§alo Ramos dispatched from 12-yards.
Randal Kolo Muani would not allow himself to miss out on the scoring action however, tallying just five minutes after Ramos to put
[PSG](/en/team/psg-263) seven head in style.
The visitorâ€™s lead grew to nine before the final whistle, capping off a thoroughly dominant
[PSG](/en/team/psg-263) showing.
